2. "Gone Girl" by Gillian Flynn: Although the central character is Amy Dunne, her ex-husband Nick Dunne plays a significant role in the intricate social engineering plot. Nick is drawn into a sophisticated web of lies and manipulation when his wife disappears on their fifth wedding anniversary.

3. "The Social Engineer" by J.A. Schneider: In this book, Sam, a former social engineer, is targeted by a former client seeking revenge for a botched job. As Sam tries to unravel the mystery, he finds himself in the middle of a dangerous game of cat and mouse.
